column4: News;The------ Appeals Court decided to continue detaining Mr. Rath Rott Mony until the lower court ruled on the case. The decision was made on the morning of January 31
column5: 2019.------Rath Rott Mony was imprisoned in Prey Sar------ after being extradited from Thailand for his involvement in a Russia Today documentary “My Mother Sold Me”
column6: which has been branded as ------fake news------ by authorities.------Repeated requests for assistance from the Russian embassy have so far been ignored.
